title.narrative: Monitoring and Evaluation Technical Support Service (METSS) II

description.narrative: (Ghana): To measure the performance of Ghana's Global Food Security Strategy (GFSS) II, FY 2019 funds will be used to extend the Monitoring and Evaluation Technical Support Service (METSS II). This funding will allow METSS II to conduct a GFSS zone of influence (ZOI) baseline survey, which will establish current conditions in the ZOI and provide a basis against which to set and measure progress toward five-year targets as the GFSS begins. A GFSS ZOI end line survey will also be conducted to determine whether statistically significant change has occurred since USAID established baselines in 2012 and whether population-based indicator targets were met. METSS II will continue to assist USAID/Ghana's Economic Growth Office, its implementing partners, and the Government of Ghana in the areas of monitoring and evaluation, research, knowledge management, and capacity building so they can learn from the results of their activities and incorporate successful interventions into their programming.
